children.subject:
"Will I have to enroll in the summer cs61B course"?

No, definitely not.

"or I am just able to show up on the final and take it and it could be included in the final calculation of the grade?"

This is a conversation between you and Professor Hug + possibly the Head TAs.

"Will It also affect my SAP status in any way?"

No comment, so I'm leaving this as a followup instead of an answer.
you should be able to take it over the summer if u want

history.content:
Please do not re-enroll in the course, or it will make a big mess for you. You need to be in conversation with Professor Hug and the summer instructors about what you need to do to complete your requirements. If they agree that you just need to re-take the final, then you can do that, and the summer instructors will report to Prof. Hug what your score was, and he can submit your grade.

If you need to know who the summer instructors are, just let me know: heather [at] berkeley [dot] edu

Please do not re-enroll in the course, or it will make a big mess for you. You need to be in conversation with Professor Hug and the summer instructors about what you need to do to complete your requirements. If they agree that you just need to re-take the final, then you can do that, and the summer instructors will report to Prof. Hug what your score was, and he can submit your grade.

I got an incomplete in 61B in sp21 due to extenuating circumstances and I can retake the final during the summer. Will I have to enroll in the summer cs61B course or I am just able to show up on the final and take it and it could be included in the final calculation of the grade? Will It also affect my SAP status in any way?
history.subject: incomplete in 61B
